name: Time Shooter 2
description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter game where players can manipulate time to dodge bullets and defeat enemies. The game features various levels and challenges.

name: Time Shooter 3
description: Time Shooter 3 is a first-person shooter game where players can manipulate time to dodge bullets and defeat enemies. The game features various levels and challenges.

name: Super Mario Bros (NES)
description: Super Mario Bros is a classic platform game where players control Mario as he navigates through various levels to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

name: Superhot
description: Superhot is a unique first-person shooter game where time moves only when you move. Players must strategize their movements to defeat enemies and complete levels.

name: Subway Surfers
description: Subway Surfers is an endless runner game where players control a character running through subway tracks, dodging trains and collecting coins.

name: Stickman Hook
description: Stickman Hook is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a stickman swinging through various obstacles using a grappling hook.

name: Soccer Random
description: Soccer Random is a fun and chaotic soccer game where players control random characters to score goals and win matches.

name: Rocket League
description: Rocket League is a vehicular soccer video game where players control rocket-powered cars to hit a ball into the opposing team's goal.

name: Retro Bowl College
description: Lead your college team to victory in this retro-style American football game. Manage your roster, call plays, and win the Retro Bowl!

name: Pacman
description: Pacman is a classic arcade game where players control Pacman to eat dots and avoid ghosts. The goal is to clear the maze while avoiding being caught.

name: Minecraft (1.12)
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. Players can gather resources, craft items, and create structures in a 3D environment. This game is an unofficial port of the original game. Eaglercraft is a Minecraft client that allows you to play Minecraft in your web browser.

name: Jello Tetrix
description: Jello Tetrix is a fun and colorful puzzle game where players arrange falling jello blocks to create complete lines.

name: Google Snake
description: The classic Google Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Avoid running into walls or yourself!

name: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy Bird is a simple yet addictive game where players control a bird and navigate it through pipes by tapping the screen.

name: Crossy Road
description: Crossy Road is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a character trying to cross roads, rivers, and train tracks while avoiding obstacles.

name: Boxing Random
description: Boxing Random is a fun and chaotic boxing game where players control random characters to fight in the ring.

name: Block Blast
description: Block Blast is a fun and addictive puzzle game where players match blocks of the same color to clear them from the board.

name: Basket Random
description: Basket Random is a fun and chaotic basketball game where players control random characters to shoot hoops and score points.

name: Moto X3M Winter
description: Moto X3M Winter is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through snowy tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M 2
description: Moto X3M 2 is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through challenging tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M Spooky Land
description: Moto X3M Spooky Land is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through spooky-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M Pool Party
description: Moto X3M Pool Party is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through challenging pool-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: 1v1.lol
description: 1v1.lol is a multiplayer online battle royale game where players can build, shoot, and outsmart their opponents in a 1v1 showdown.

name: Paper.io
description: Paper.io is a multiplayer online game where players control a square and try to capture territory by drawing lines. The goal is to eliminate other players and expand your territory.

name: Retro Bowl
description: Lead your team to glory in this retro-style American football game. Manage your roster, call plays, and win the Retro Bowl!

name: Slope
description: Control a ball rolling down a steep slope. Avoid obstacles and keep the ball on the track as long as possible in this fast-paced 3D game.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: The original idle game where you click cookies to bake more cookies. Buy upgrades, hire grandmas, and unlock achievements!

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift your way to victory in this car drifting game. Navigate through challenging tracks, perform drifts, and collect coins to unlock new cars.

name: Tetris
description: The timeless classic puzzle game. Arrange the falling blocks (Tetriminos) to create complete horizontal lines.
